person.name: Wilmoore
person.topic: I am the chief guard in the village of Paws!
Paws is a great village and we keep it safe!Dost thou mean to cause trouble?Then thou had best leave!Good.
Pirates come from an isle to the east!

person.name: Francesca
person.topic: I saw the way ya dealt with ol' Red Eye!Ya haven't come to steal a horse I hope?Well the master ain't gonna like that much!Then must be to see Smith!

person.name: Sven
person.topic: Wit' my axe, I can chop'm down quick, ya.
It's a big axe, ya.Art ya a lumberjack?Good for you, ya.Build up those arms, ya!

person.name: Zair the Wise
person.topic: Its secrets are boundless!Seen it?Wow!Seek it!
A three part key and a word of passage are needed to enter the chamber. Ask my brother beyond Lock Lake of the word!

person.name: Sal
person.topic: I am the barmaid I serve the ale!
We have the finest brew in Britannia!
We serve only Folley on tap!Dost thou favor Folley?A great mug if I may say so!Too bad, it's the best!

person.name: Jingles
person.topic: I seek the wisdom of magic.
My master knows the gate travel spell!
My master is Mentorian.Dost thou know him?Good.He lives in a hidden village in Lock Lake reachable only by ship, ask of the gate spell!

person.name: Sir Hobie
person.topic: Tired and hungry but always faithful.
My quest is to defeat the evils of the world.'tis thy quest also?We are as one.A shame it is!

person.name: Damsel
person.topic: I am here to buy food.
Yes, I hear they have the best rations here.
Rations are used in dungeons.Dost thou travel in the depths?In the great castle there is a secret entrance!Probably a wimp.

person.name: Wheatpin
person.topic: Fine.Art thou looking for something?What?I see.
Around there in the nook of the mountains!

person.name: Barren
person.topic: Britannia.Art thou dim?I thought so.We shall see.
Search the hills in the south-east corner of town!

person.name: Sir Simon
person.topic: Mystics can be found by an eight parts avatar!Hast thou attained enlightenment in all eight virtues?The mystic armour lies in the center of the oak grove!Alas.

person.name: Lady Tessa
person.topic: Mystics can be found by an eight parts avatar!Hast thou attained enlightenment in all eight virtues?The mystic weapons lie in the training room of Serpent castle!Alas.

person.name: Asemly
person.topic: I am here to serve thee.
Well, I can dance and sing!Does that interest thee?Good!Well then, I guess I'm no help at all then.

person.name: Little Jon
person.topic: Britannia is a land so fair, to other lands I would not dare!I hear that thou art from another world?What is it called?Just a rumor.
I hope someday thou may return!
